name: The Dieland
description:
Welcome to the island. You're stranded here for 3 days and you must survive on the wildlife. Fish, bunnies and foxes are plentiful but fight for their survival. Bigger game such as pumas and bears also roam the island hungry for those ill prepared. The island maintains its balance so tread lightly and choose your prey wisely or else the entire system falls out of place.

You hear a mysterious melody in the wind. Following it may bring powers that help you... for a cost.
